code: @Manual{,   title = {bbk: Client for the Bundesbank API},   author = {Maximilian Muecke},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.3.0.9000, https://github.com/m-muecke/bbk},   url = {https://m-muecke.github.io/bbk/}, }

title: Client for the Bundesbank API
text: bbk minimal R client Bundesbank ECB API APIs.

title: Client for the Bundesbank API
text: can install released version bbk CRAN : development version GitHub :

title: Client for the Bundesbank API
text: bbk functions prefixed bbk_ follow naming convention API. usual workflow search time series key Bundesbank website use retrieve data either bbk_data() bkb_series() depending needs. Despite querying different endpoints, functions return data. However, bbk_data() flexible allows customisation.
code: library(bbk)  # fetch 10 year daily yield curve yield_curve <- bbk_data(   flow = "BBSIS",   key = "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01" ) yield_curve #> # A tibble: 1,138 × 25 #>   date       key           value title freq  bearer_reg item  valuation currency #>   <date>     <chr>         <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr>      <chr> <chr>     <chr>    #> 1 2020-01-02 BBSIS.D.I.ZA… -0.16 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 2 2020-01-03 BBSIS.D.I.ZA… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 3 2020-01-06 BBSIS.D.I.ZA… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 4 2020-01-07 BBSIS.D.I.ZA… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 5 2020-01-08 BBSIS.D.I.ZA… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> # ℹ 1,133 more rows #> # ℹ 16 more variables: issuer_class <chr>, listed_sub <chr>, #> #   security_class <chr>, maturity <chr>, interest_type <chr>, #> #   interest_rate <chr>, redemption <chr>, certificate <chr>, coverage <chr>, #> #   rating <chr>, time_format <chr>, decimals <chr>, unit <chr>, #> #   unit_mult <chr>, category <chr>, unit_eng <chr>

title: Client for the Bundesbank API
text: bundesbank: R scripts downloading time-series data Bundesbank. ecb: R interface European Central Bank’s Statistical Data Warehouse (SDW) API. rsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. readsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. pdfetch: R package downloading economic financial time series public sources.

what: bbk: Client for the Bundesbank API — bbk-package

what: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: Returns data given flow key

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
code: bbk_data(   flow,   key = NULL,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: flow character(1) flow query, 5-8 characters. See bbk_metadata() available dataflows. key character(1) key query. start_period character(1) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., "2019") YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period character(1) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: data.frame() requested data.

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
code: # \donttest{ # fetch all data for a given flow and key bbk_data("BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A") #> # A tibble: 6,818 × 25 #>    date       key          value title freq  bearer_reg item  valuation currency #>    <date>     <chr>        <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr>      <chr> <chr>     <chr>    #>  1 1997-08-07 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.76 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  2 1997-08-08 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.76 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  3 1997-08-11 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.75 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  4 1997-08-12 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.72 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  5 1997-08-13 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.77 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  6 1997-08-14 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.74 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  7 1997-08-15 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.72 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  8 1997-08-18 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.72 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  9 1997-08-19 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.66 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 10 1997-08-20 BBSIS.D.I.Z…  5.71 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> # ℹ 6,808 more rows #> # ℹ 16 more variables: issuer_class <chr>, listed_sub <chr>, #> #   security_class <chr>, maturity <chr>, interest_type <chr>, #> #   interest_rate <chr>, redemption <chr>, certificate <chr>, coverage <chr>, #> #   rating <chr>, time_format <chr>, decimals <chr>, unit <chr>, #> #   unit_mult <chr>, category <chr>, unit_eng <chr> # fetch data for multiple keys bbk_data("BBK01", c("TTA032", "TTA010")) #> # A tibble: 5,184 × 10 #>    date       key   value title freq  dim1  time_format decimals unit  unit_mult #>    <date>     <chr> <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>       <chr>    <chr> <chr>     #>  1 1998-12-22 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  2 1999-01-01 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  3 1999-01-08 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  4 1999-01-15 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  5 1999-01-22 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  6 1999-01-29 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  7 1999-02-05 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  8 1999-02-12 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #>  9 1999-02-19 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #> 10 1999-02-26 BBK0…     0 Clai… daily TTA0… P1D         0        EURO  6         #> # ℹ 5,174 more rows # specified period (start date-end date) for daily data bbk_data(   "BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01",   end_period = "2020-08-01" ) #> # A tibble: 148 × 25 #>    date       key          value title freq  bearer_reg item  valuation currency #>    <date>     <chr>        <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr>      <chr> <chr>     <chr>    #>  1 2020-01-02 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.16 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  2 2020-01-03 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  3 2020-01-06 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  4 2020-01-07 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  5 2020-01-08 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.27 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  6 2020-01-09 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.22 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  7 2020-01-10 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.2  Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  8 2020-01-13 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.19 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #>  9 2020-01-14 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.17 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> 10 2020-01-15 BBSIS.D.I.Z… -0.22 Yiel… daily I          ZAR   ZI        EUR      #> # ℹ 138 more rows #> # ℹ 16 more variables: issuer_class <chr>, listed_sub <chr>, #> #   security_class <chr>, maturity <chr>, interest_type <chr>, #> #   interest_rate <chr>, redemption <chr>, certificate <chr>, coverage <chr>, #> #   rating <chr>, time_format <chr>, decimals <chr>, unit <chr>, #> #   unit_mult <chr>, category <chr>, unit_eng <chr> # or only specify the start date bbk_data(   "BBSIS", "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2024-04-01" ) #> # title: Returns the available metadata — bbk_metadata
text: Retrieval metadata stored Bundesbank's time series database. Access via SDMX Web Service API Bundesbank.

title: Returns the available metadata — bbk_metadata
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-metadata

title: Returns the available metadata — bbk_metadata
text: type character(1) type metadata query. One : "datastructure", "dataflow", "codelist", "concept". id character(1) id query. Default NULL. lang character(1) language query, either "en" "de". Default "en".

title: Returns the available metadata — bbk_metadata
text: data.frame() queried metadata. columns : id id metadata name name metadata

title: Returns the available metadata — bbk_metadata
code: # \donttest{ bbk_metadata("datastructure") #> # A tibble: 73 × 2 #>    id        name                                                                #>    <chr>     <chr>                                                               #>  1 BBK_BSPL  Profit and loss                                                     #>  2 BBK_DOES  Short-term economic indicators (classified by economic sector)      #>  3 BBK_ERX   ECB euro reference exchange rates, exchange rates in particular co… #>  4 BBK_ESBOP External sector Balance of Payments according to BPM6               #>  5 BBK_EXBS  Business and consumer surveys of foreign countries                  #>  6 BBK_DOSC  System of  indicators for the German commercial real estate market  #>  7 BBK_DOSR  System of indicators for the German residential property market     #>  8 BBK_EXNA  National Accounts of foreign countries                              #>  9 BBK_EXPR  Consumer Prices of foreign countries                                #> 10 BBK_EXEI  Leading indicators of foreign countries                             #> # ℹ 63 more rows bbk_metadata("dataflow", "BBSIS") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   id    name                                 #>   <chr> <chr>                                #> 1 BBSIS Securities Issues Statistics (Bonds) bbk_metadata("codelist", "CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY") #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   id                          name                 #>   <chr>                       <chr>                #> 1 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets / Liabilities #> 2 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Assets               #> 3 CL_BBK_ACIP_ASSET_LIABILITY Liabilities          bbk_metadata("concept", "CS_BBK_BSPL") #> # A tibble: 38 × 2 #>    id          name                                          #>    <chr>       <chr>                                         #>  1 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit and loss                               #>  2 CS_BBK_BSPL Frequency (BBk)                               #>  3 CS_BBK_BSPL Area (countries, list of countries), BBk only #>  4 CS_BBK_BSPL Adjustment (BBk)                              #>  5 CS_BBK_BSPL Reference sector breakdown                    #>  6 CS_BBK_BSPL Profit/Loss Item                              #>  7 CS_BBK_BSPL Original maturity                             #>  8 CS_BBK_BSPL Data type                                     #>  9 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart area                              #> 10 CS_BBK_BSPL Counterpart Sector                            #> # ℹ 28 more rows # }

what: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: Returns data given flow key

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
code: ecb_data(   flow,   key = NULL,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/data

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: flow character(1) flow query. key character(1) key query. start_period character(1) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., "2019") YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period character(1) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data

title: Returns the available metadata — ecb_metadata
text: Retrieval metadata stored ECB's time series database. Access via SDMX Web Service API ECB

title: Returns the available metadata — ecb_metadata
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/metadata

title: Returns the available metadata — ecb_metadata
text: type character(1) type metadata query. One : "datastructure", "dataflow", "codelist", "concept". agency character(1) id agency query. Default NULL. id character(1) id resource query. Default NULL.

title: Returns the available metadata — ecb_metadata
text: data.frame() queried metadata. columns : agency agency metadata id id metadata name name metadata
